success_criteria.notes: Success if the assistant schedules the Lifeboat Engine Sea Trial outdoor event in Portsmouth Harbor, NH via create_meeting for 150 minutes on a suitable weather window close to the preferred date.

task.objective: Schedule an outdoor lifeboat engine sea trial and training session

injected_behaviors.instructions: The user wants to schedule an outdoor lifeboat engine sea trial and training session for a few junior crew members in Portsmouth Harbor. They prefer a Saturday morning with calm winds and no heavy rain, and they want to check the marine forecast and dock availability before locking in the time.

nearby_marinas.name: Prescott Park Municipal Docks
nearby_marinas.notes: Day-use tie-up available for small craft; request lifeboat drill notice at harbormaster office.

nearby_marinas.name: Kittery Point Yacht Yard
nearby_marinas.notes: Limited transient space; may allow brief engine run-up alongside by prior arrangement.

nearby_marinas.name: Peirce Island Boat Launch
nearby_marinas.notes: Public ramp with floating docks, suitable for launching and recovery of small lifeboats.
